name: SingleTokenSale
description: A simple single IDO token sale contract. Opens an IDO token sale contract upon deployment. The deployer can end the IDO at any point.

eventDecorators.name: Bought
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: IDOEnded
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

functionDecorators.name: addWhitelistAddress
functionDecorators.description: Add an address to the whitelisted group.

functionDecorators.name: buyTokens
functionDecorators.description: A payable function to buy tokens from the IDO. Uses the ETHMWT exchange rate to calculate the tokens to buy. Enforce sa maximum buyable token amount per wallet.

functionDecorators.name: endIDOSale
functionDecorators.description: Ends the IDO token sale. Drain all ETH raised and MWT left in this IDO contract.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeWhiteList
functionDecorators.description: Remove an address to the whitelisted group.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setETHMWTExchangeRate
functionDecorators.description: Get updated ETHUSD price from chainlink and calculate ETHMWT Exchange rate. Calculate and save the ETHMWT and ETHUSD exchange rate.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawTokenSaleFunds
functionDecorators.description: Sends all IDO funds back to deployer address.
